悉尼.definition: Sydney, capital of New South Wales, Australia

悉心.definition: to put one's heart (and soul) into sth; with great care

悉悉索索.definition: (onom.) rustling sound (of clothing, leaves, snow etc); faint noises

悉數.definition: all; every single one; the entire sum

悉聽尊便.definition: (idiom) do as you see fit; do whatever you like; (I, we) leave it in your hands

悉達多.definition: Siddhartha Gautama (563-485 BC), the historical Buddha and founder of Buddhism
